featured.text: With the worsening of global economic conditions, it seems wiser and more _____ to keep cash in the bank rather than to invest in the stock market.
To reach the goal of making her company a market leader, Michelle _____ a plan to open ten new stores around the country this year.
Ann enjoyed going to the flower market.
New products continue to expand the market.

other.text: Amir tried to get to the market on the following days, but the donkey ___(34)___ the same trick and ruined the salt.
From then on, the donkey learned the lesson, and ___(40)___ carried Amir’s salt to the market without ruining it.
He marketed his brand by giving clothes to famous MTV stars and featuring teen stars in his print ads.
Many teenagers make a lot of profits in the fashion market today.
The hula hoop gained international popularity in the late 1950s, when a plastic version was successfully marketed by California’s Wham-O toy company.
Although about 90 percent of American households still use film cameras, digital cameras are capturing a growing share of the consumer market.
The generator is now in place at the cactus market, where the vendors are enthusiastic about this new way to utilize the tons of cactus husks that once went directly into the trash.
It has been a market favorite since its first appearance.
Dad certainly had the list 33 when he left for the market, but he would somehow forget it, and then would find it again only after he returned home.
The area produces 200,000 tons a year of prickly pear cactus—up to 10 tons of which ends up as waste on the floor of the cactus market each day.
Selling fried chicken at the night market doesn’t seem to be a decent business, but it is actually quite ______.
The local farmers’ market is popular as it offers a variety of fresh seasonal ______ to people in the community.
Mom seldom asked Dad to go shopping in the traditional market for her.
So he stopped going to the market for three days and tried to think of a way to ___(36)___
A few years after the soldier’s knife was issued, the “Schweizer Offizier Messer,” or Swiss Officer’s Knife, came on the market.
Another fun 37 is shopping at the open market where local folks sell produce grown in their gardens.

definition.zh_def: 市場；交易的場所或系統。
definition.en_def: A place or system where goods and services are bought and sold.
definition.example: She went to the market to buy fresh vegetables.
